Every Boolean operation can be expressed in terms of the AND and NOT operations.
==Proof==

* <math>P \lor Q </math> is equivalent to <math>\neg (\neg P \land \neg Q)</math>
* <math>P \rightarrow Q</math> is equivalent to <math>\neg P \lor Q</math>
* <math>P \leftrightarrow Q</math> is equivalent to <math>(P \rightarrow Q) \land (Q \rightarrow P)</math>
* <math>P \oplus Q</math> is equivalent to <math>\neg (P \leftrightarrow Q)</math>
